thread.title: Police: Two dead, including toddler, in North Lawndale shooting – Chicago Sun-Times
thread.title_full: Police: Two dead, including toddler, in North Lawndale shooting – Chicago Sun-Times

title: Police: Two dead, including toddler, in North Lawndale shooting – Chicago Sun-Times
text:
Police: Two dead, including toddler, in North Lawndale shooting Jordan Owen 
Sun-Times file photo 
Two people, including a toddler, were killed; and a third person was wounded in a shooting Tuesday afternoon in the North Lawndale neighborhood on the West Side, according to Chicago Police. 
Three people were shot about 1:30 p.m. in the 2300 block of South Kenneth, police said. 
Two people, including a toddler between 2 and 3 years old, were killed, police said. A third person was wounded.
